changes.description: Comments for containerClasses and containerStyle already exist in MarkdownEditor.tsx
details: Line 428: CSS fallback comment for containerClasses (isFallbackMode only)
Lines 435-440: Detailed Issue #104 comment explaining z-index difference between containerClasses and containerStyle

quality_metrics.notes: No code changes required - comments already present

summary: Refactoring verification completed. The comments explaining the difference between containerClasses and containerStyle were already added during the TDD implementation phase. containerClasses applies 'fixed inset-0' only when isFallbackMode is true (CSS fallback for iOS Safari). containerStyle applies z-index for ALL maximized states (both native Fullscreen API and fallback mode) to ensure the editor appears above other UI elements like terminal tabs on iPad Chrome landscape.
message: No changes required - documentation comments already in place from Issue #104 bug fix implementation.
